title: The War in the East: Part 1 with Bill Frankland
itunes:title: The War in the East: Part 1 with Bill Frankland
itunes:subtitle: In this episode taken from our archive, I talk to Dr Bill Frankland (19 March 1912 – 2 April 2020), a veteran of World War Two who lived through a Japanese prisoner of war camp and who also made important contributions to our understanding of allergies.
description:
In this episode taken from our archive, I talk to Dr Bill Frankland (19 March 1912 – 2 April 2020), a veteran of World War Two who lived through a Japanese prisoner of war camp and who also made important contributions to our understanding of allergies.


You can listen to part 2 of this podcast here.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
